item.title: How To Learn The Conductor's Melody In Silksong
item.description:
Obtaining the Conductor's Melody is one of the main quests you need to complete before advancing in Hollow Knight: Silksong . This melody is one out of three that players need to get. Additionally, all are located in different areas with different methods to access them; one requires solving a puzzle, another requires some platforming, while the Conductor's Melody is locked behind a boss fight in the High Halls . Also, it may seem easier than the rest, but it's actually more difficult as it's a pretty draining boss fight in Silksong .

How To Reach The High Halls In Silksong

The Conductor's Melody is located in a small room at the end of the High Halls area in HK Silksong . To reach the High Halls, Hornet must first defeat the Cogwork Dancers boss in Cogwork Core . The boss area is accessed from the left or right side of the Choral Chambers. After arriving and taking care of the boss, players will find out that three melodies are required to proceed. Getting the Conductor's Melody does require the Clawline Ability and Double Jump Ability , so make sure to unlock them first.

From the boss's room, keep going left without taking any turns until a bench appears in Silksong . Use the gold ring above to move to the top and avoid the spikes to land on a platform. Head right to enter the High Halls and start exploring. The area is pretty straightforward, as you need to keep going right and up through the rooms until you eventually glide down to the bottom.

Upon entering the High Halls, use the Clawline to throw the needle into the rings, gaining leverage, and then Double Jump to reach the platforms. Ignore or fight the enemies, then repeat the steps while going right until Hornet lands on a platform.

In the next room, a giant wheel with three gold rings is spinning slowly. Hook into one of the rings and wait for the wheel to move you up, then hook into another one next to the wall. Cling to the wall and move up to eventually jump on the platform and proceed to the right. Repeat the same steps in the following room; hook onto the rings, double jump on the platforms while ignoring enemies, until players reach the door.

Instead of using the wheel to go up, glide down slowly and use the gold ring to remove the spikes blocking the way. Keep doing the same thing while heading down and avoiding the spikes. Ignore the paths to the left and glide through the open door on the ground.

Land at the bottom of the room, and turn right first to unlock the bench to rest, the station to fast-travel, and the map for easier navigation. Once players are done, get out of the safe zone and keep going left to reach the boss fight.

How To Learn Conductor's Melody In Silksong

To learn the Conductor's Melody in Silksong , defeat the boss guarding Conductor Ballador at the bottom of the High Halls . It's not technically a boss, as Hornet will just get attacked by groups of familiar enemies. The fight is pretty long and tough though, so prepare the best skills and tools to make it easier. There are more than 10 phases with enemies starting with small and fragile to two mini-bosses that deal massive damage at the end.

After the fight is over, continue left into the hidden room to meet Conductor Ballador. Speak with him to play the Needolin and learn the Conductor's Melody in Hollow Knight: Silksong .

item.title: Battlefield 2042 Reveals Patch Notes for September 9 Update
item.description:
The developers of Battlefield 2042 have recently unveiled the patch notes for Update 9.2.1, a hotfix that corrects some aspects of the popular first-person shooter. While the new Battlefield 2042 does not bring new content for players, this is still an important patch, as it continues to polish the game.

Developed by DICE and published by Electronic Arts, Battlefield 2042 was released in November 2021. Unlike other installments in the series, Battlefield 2042 did not have a single-player campaign, but at least it featured cross-play support, something that the franchise did not have before this installment. Soon after the launch, the title had a fairly mixed reception due to technical issues and failed to meet EA's sales expectations. Over time, however, it became more popular. Last month, Battlefield 2042 surpassed Call of Duty in its simultaneous Steam player count for a period of time, with over 74,000 gamers versus 70,000 from Activision’s shooter.

With Battlefield 2042 popular once again, its devs released the patch notes for Update 9.2.1, which will be available on September 9, 2025. Most of the changes are bug fixes, including multiple problems related to the new Lynx Sniper Rifle weapon, and a balance pass for the SWS-10. The patch also fixed some issues where Player Backgrounds “Always Check Your Rear” and “Teamwork Makes the Dream Work” were accidentally swapped. Additionally, Renewal has returned to the Team Deathmatch playlist. Finally, the devs also corrected issues with weekly missions and the Tier Skip functionality.

This latest patch comes on the heels of Update 9.2.0 for Battlefield 2042 , which was released in August. The update added the iconic Iwo Jima map to the game, which was seen in other entries such as Battlefield 1942 , Battlefield 1943 , and Battlefield 5 . It also included a few new weapons, such as the KFS2000 Assault Rifle, the Lynx Sniper Rifle, as well as the A10 Warthog and SU-25TM Frogfoot vehicles.

According to previous leaks, it’s expected that Update 9.20 would be the last major update for Battlefield 2042 before the release of Battlefield 6 . Battlefield 6 will be released on October 10, 2025, and it’s expected to be one of the most popular FPS games of this year, but with DICE working on it alongside other studios, the new content for the previous entry will likely slow down.

During the Battlefield 6 open beta last month, thousands of gamers played and approved the upcoming shooter, despite some criticizing the maps for being too small. These initial impressions gave the community high hopes for the actual launch, which will have a wider selection of maps and more.

BATTLEFIELD 2042 UPDATE #9.2.1

Phantom

  • The Penguins have seen individuals brute-forcing into the Phantom Project and have added additional defenses to ensure the reward is for Operatives who are fully deserving of the loot that awaits.

Weapons & Gadgets

  • Fixed an issue on the Lynx where extended magazine reload was slower than intended. The reload animation is now faster, making it look less like slow motion and more like just motion.
  • Fixed an issue with the Lynx’s recoil and camera motion.
  • Fixed an issue where the accuracy is lower than intended when standing still for the Lynx.
  • Balance pass with SWS-10 and Armor Piercing Rounds and the Masterkey.
  • Fixed an issue where multiple Underbarrel Shotgun Attachments on Vault Weapons were not tracking progress towards quests that require you to get kills with underbarrel shotguns. For example, the unlock quest for the AK5C.
  • Fixed an issue where the SOFLAM and Tracer Dart interaction with a vehicle would not show “Target Acquired” messaging.

Maps & Modes

  • Renewal has been returned to the Team Deathmatch playlist offering.

Playercards

  • Fixed an issue where the names of Playercard Backgrounds ‘Always Check Your Rear’ and ‘Teamwork Makes the Dream Work’ were accidentally swapped.

Weekly Missions & Progression

  • Fixed an issue where some weekly missions about doing actions with Vault Weapons would not track with the M1 Garand in All Out Warfare.
  • Tier Skip functionality is now active on the Road to Battlefield 6 Pass.

Battlefield 2042 is a first-person shooter that marks the return to the iconic all-out warfare of the franchise. With the help of a cutting-edge arsenal, engage in intense, immersive multiplayer battles.

Lead your team to victory in both large all-out warfare and close-quarters combat on maps from the world of 2042 and classic Battlefield titles. Find your playstyle in class-based gameplay and take on several experiences comprising elevated versions of Conquest and Breakthrough. Explore Battlefield Portal, a platform where players can discover, create, and share unexpected battles from Battlefield's past and present.

This game includes optional in-game purchases of virtual currency that can be used to acquire virtual in-game items.

item.title: Fortnite Could Be Getting a REPO Crossover Soon
item.description:
A new rumor teases that Fortnite may release a crossover with REPO soon. Fortnite has established itself as a game with one of the most impressive crossover lists. Through these collaborations, Epic Games' battle royale has brought in not only characters from acclaimed IPs but also famous personalities.

Expanding on the prolific collaboration between Fortnite and Marvel, Chapter 5 Season 4 added skins for Doctor Doom, War Machine, Shuri, Emma Frost, and more. With Season 5, Epic Games introduced players to cosmetics based on beloved movie characters, such as Cruella de Vil, Maleficent, Edward Scissorhands, and Sally from Nightmare Before Christmas . Fortnite 's crossovers are one of its most popular aspects, as they expand the game's reach to different audiences. Now, according to a new rumor, this list may soon get bigger.

Fortnite Leak Teases Collaboration With Indie Hit REPO

On Twitter, well-known Fortnite leakers Shiina and FNBRintel claimed that the game will have a crossover with REPO soon. According to them, the collaboration is confirmed, but they did not give further details on what Fortnite players can expect from it. The comments on the tweet reacted largely positively to the potential crossover with the indie hit REPO , with some mentioning that they would like to see an emote based on the popular “I love” animation. Others speculate that the collaboration could bring the characters in the form of backblings or kicks.

Released in February 2025, REPO quickly gained prominence on Steam, sitting alongside other famous co-op games such as Valheim , Baldur's Gate 3 , and Helldivers 2 . REPO is a horror game in which players team up with up to five friends to recover valuable items from haunted environments. This task is not so simple, however, because in addition to entering places that give players the chills, they encounter monsters such as Banger, a skull with feet that explodes, and the Headman, one of the most dangerous and frightening creatures in REPO .

It is worth noting that the crossover between REPO and Fortnite is not officially confirmed. Therefore, players should take this information with a grain of salt, as the details may change until Epic Games makes an official announcement. However, if confirmed, it won't be the first time the game has joined forces with an indie game. Previously, Fortnite collaborated with Lethal Company , adding a skin based on the Employee. In 2022, another collab that got players talking added Among Us -based skins to the battle royale.

item.title: Upcoming Superhero Games People Are Excited For
item.description:
Superhero fatigue may be a real thing now, but this mainly applies to movies. Video games took a while to reach a point where players could experience good quality games featuring their favorite heroes, with many people crediting Rocksteady as the company that spearheaded this change.

As things stand, several upcoming superhero games promise to excite fans with their offerings. From Marvel's deluge of titles to some interesting offerings from other studios, there's no shortage of cool superhero games that fans can soon sink their teeth into.

Marvel 1943: Rise Of Hydra

Captain America And Black Panther Team Up To Take Down Hydra

Marvel 1943: Rise of Hydra
Action-Adventure
Systems
Released
2025

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
t
Powered by

If there's one thing the first Captain America movie showed, it's that the World War 2 setting is fascinating for a superhero movie to make the most of. This is why many fans are looking forward to Marvel 1943: Rise of Hydra , which is shaping up to be something special.

Seeing Black Panther and Captain America form an uneasy alliance to stop the rise of Hydra sounds excellent, and fans can't wait to see the wild direction the story goes in. With Amy Hennig as one of the producers, fans can expect bombastic action in the same vein as the Uncharted games.

Marvel Tokon: Fighting Souls

One Of The Cooler-Looking Fighting Games Players Are Looking Forward To

Marvel Tokon: Fighting Souls
Fighting
Systems
Released
2026

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Powered by

As seen in the Guilty Gear games and Dragon Ball FighterZ , it's clear that Arc System Works is very adept when it comes to developing quality games. The sheer amount of style seen in Marvel Tokon: Fighting Souls makes it clear as day.

By distancing itself from the character designs of the superhero movies, Fighting Souls is already worming its way into the hearts of fans. The Gundam-inspired design for Iron Man looks incredible, and fans can't wait to check out yet another excellent fighting game from this studio when Marvel Tokon finally releases.

Invincible VS

A Fighting Game Featuring Characters From This Beloved Series

Invincible VS
Fighting
Systems
Developer(s)
Quarter Up

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Powered by

Amazon's adaptation of Invincible has done a great job of turning this IP into one of the most popular superhero brands around. With the roster of heroes and villains expanding to reach ridiculous heights, it's easy to see why Invincible was prime material for a superhero fighting game.

Invincible VS will let players control numerous notable characters from the IP, including Invincible, Omni-Man, and Atom Eve, to name a few. It has its work cut out for it in the competitive fighting game market, but there's always a chance that the game pulls out something special and makes both old fans and newcomers happy with the end result.

Marvel's Wolverine

Insomniac Games Will Do Wonders With The Wolverine IP

Marvel's Wolverine
Systems
Developer(s)
Insomniac Games
Publisher(s)
Sony
Franchise
Marvel

Powered by

Marvel's Wolverine is the latest IP that Insomniac will tackle, following their amazing work on the Spider-Man games. Fans are confident that this studio has all the tools in its arsenal to do justice to this mutant.

The game needs to make Wolverine 's combat as brutal as ever, and fans can only wait and see whether this game follows an open-world format or follows a linear structure. Even a leak can't stop the hype train Insomniac Studios is on right now, and fans can't wait to see this beloved X-Man get to shine in a good video game after the surprisingly good video game adaptation that was X-Men Origins: Wolverine .

Marvel's Blade

This Underappreciated Vampire-Hunting Hero Deserves More Love

Marvel's Blade
Developer(s)
Arkane Studios
Publisher(s)
Bethesda Softworks
Franchise
Marvel

Powered by

The idea of playing an immersive sim superhero game is enough to make anyone salivate, which is why Marvel's Blade is shaping up to be such a tantalizing prospect. Redfall was a major misstep from Microsoft and Arkane, and fans are hoping that this mistake won't be repeated with this game.

Blade is a tantalizing superhero who spends most of his time taking out vampires. He's long overdue for a good video game that highlights his strengths, and Arkane's approach should ensure that both stealth and combat feel great as this character.

Marvel's Iron Man

A Great Video Game Adaptation Starring Tony Stark Is Long Overdue

Marvel's Iron Man is a title that fans don't know a lot about right now. However, the people behind the lauded Dead Space remake are at the helm, so there's no reason why fans can't expect something great from this title.

Fans can't wait for more news surrounding the hero who single-handedly stoked the flames of hype for the MCU. It's only fitting that this cinematic universe is struggling to find a footing following his death, and one can only hope that Marvel's Iron Man gives this hero the treatment he deserved in the video game landscape all along.

Dispatch

Players Control A Dispatcher Who Sends Heroes To Deal With Crimes

Dispatch
Strategy
Point-and-click
Adventure
Systems
Released
2025

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Powered by

Dispatch sports a unique take on the superhero dynamic. Instead of controlling a hero as one would expect, players step into the shoes of a hero whose mech suit is ruined after a battle against his nemesis, forcing him to become a dispatcher as he governs a gang of misfits and ne'er-do-wells who clearly need a guiding hand on how to efficiently be a hero.

This entails a good deal of strategic gameplay as players analyze the strengths and weaknesses of their heroes before assigning them to certain tasks. All of this comes packaged with branching dialogue options as players shape the way the story unfolds in a game that promises to combine action and comedy in one tantalizing package.

Marvel Cosmic Invasion

A Superhero Beat-'em-Up Game Meant To Elicit The Brilliance Of Retro Titles

MARVEL Cosmic Invasion
Beat 'Em Up
Superhero
Action
Systems
Released
2025

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Powered by

Fans of classic beat-'em-up games will get a kick out of playing Marvel Cosmic Invasion , a game that promises to channel a player's nostalgia for these retro titles. Players control one of several Marvel superheroes, using their powers to thwart the villainous plans of Annihilus.

The characters players can control include Captain America, She-Hulk, Spider-Man, Storm, Silver Surfer, Venom, and Wolverine, to name a few. This roster itself is tantalizing, and fans can't wait to get their hands on Marvel Cosmic Invasion when it comes out sometime in 2025.

item.title: Genshin Impact 6.0 Release Date (Luna I Nod-Krai) & Maintenance End Time
item.description:
Although players don't get to experience the mainland of Snezhnaya in Genshin Impact 6.0, they can still visit Nod-Krai. Here's the Nod-Krai release date for Genshin Impact 6.0 , also known as Genshin Impact Luna I .

When Is Genshin Impact 6.0 (Nod-Krai Luna I) Coming Out?

Genshin Impact Nod-Krai is scheduled to release on September 9, 2025 (UTC-4 or earlier), or September 10, 2025 (UTC-3 or later). Essentially, players in the US time zone will have Nod-Krai on the evening of September 9, while those in the Asian time zone can begin playing on September 10, in the morning or noon.

Lauma Banner Release Date In Genshin Impact

Lauma Release Date: September 9, 2025 – September 30, 2025 (Phase 1)

Lauma Debut

Nahida Rerun

Weapon Banner

Chronicled Wish

Lauma banner debuts on September 9, 2025 , for players in the US timezone, while Travelers in the European and Asian timezones can begin pulling on September 10, 2025 ​​​​​​. Alongside Lauma's banner in Genshin Luna I is the rerun of Nahida in Genshin Impact .

There will also be a Chronicled Wish with various Sumeru characters, like Dehya, Alhaitham, Wanderer, Cyno, Tighnari, and Nilou in Genshin Impact .

Learn more about Genshin Impact banner here.

Genshin Impact 6.0 (Luna I) Maintenance Ends & Start Time
